channel.title: Comments on: Paleo Double Chocolate Banana Muffins (Top 8 Free, Cassava-Free & Coconut-Free)

item.title: By: Lindsay
item.dc:creator: Lindsay
item.description: These are SO good! The people in my home who don’t have food allergies love them too… but they have especially been a lifesaver “treat” for my 19 yo son w multiple food allergies. Thank you so much for a delicious, easy to follow recipe!
item.content:encoded: These are SO good! The people in my home who don’t have food allergies love them too… but they have especially been a lifesaver “treat” for my 19 yo son w multiple food allergies. Thank you so much for a delicious, easy to follow recipe!

item.title: By: Eileen
item.dc:creator: Eileen
item.description: Holy cow! You can do no wrong. These muffins turned out like bakery muffins…they’re insane! Thank you so much for the recipe!! Used the chia seed option for anyone wondering
item.content:encoded: Holy cow! You can do no wrong. These muffins turned out like bakery muffins…they’re insane! Thank you so much for the recipe!! Used the chia seed option for anyone wondering

item.title: By: Stephanie
item.dc:creator: Stephanie
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/paleo-double-chocolate-banana-muffins-top-8-free/#comment-491">Andrea</a>.
Hi Andrea, thank you for reaching out about this question. I recommend following the recipe as written - this will make the gelatin act like an "egg" substitute. I would be worried about a consistency issue in the batter otherwise. Let me know if you give the recipe a try - I would love to hear how it turns out!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Andrea.

Hi Andrea, thank you for reaching out about this question. I recommend following the recipe as written – this will make the gelatin act like an “egg” substitute. I would be worried about a consistency issue in the batter otherwise. Let me know if you give the recipe a try – I would love to hear how it turns out!

item.title: By: Andrea
item.dc:creator: Andrea
item.description: Hi, has anyone tried just mixing the powdered gelatin in with the dry and adding the water to the wet? Does it make a difference in texture or fluffiness?
item.content:encoded:
Hi,
has anyone tried just mixing the powdered gelatin in with the dry and adding the water to the wet? Does it make a difference in texture or fluffiness?

item.title: By: Laura
item.dc:creator: Laura
item.description: These muffins are insane! I just made them yesterday and wow I am so happy that I tried it out. Looking forward to trying some of your other muffin recipes!
item.content:encoded: These muffins are insane! I just made them yesterday and wow I am so happy that I tried it out. Looking forward to trying some of your other muffin recipes!

item.title: By: Stephanie
item.dc:creator: Stephanie
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/paleo-double-chocolate-banana-muffins-top-8-free/#comment-391">Andy</a>.
Thanks for reaching out. I have never made an "egg" with agar agar but I am sure if you look it up online you can find some good directions.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Andy.

Thanks for reaching out. I have never made an “egg” with agar agar but I am sure if you look it up online you can find some good directions.

item.title: By: Andy
item.dc:creator: Andy
item.description: Hi, can we replace gelatin egg with agar agar? How do I do it? Thank you
item.content:encoded: Hi, can we replace gelatin egg with agar agar? How do I do it? Thank you

item.title: By: Stephanie
item.dc:creator: Stephanie
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/paleo-double-chocolate-banana-muffins-top-8-free/#comment-346">Claudia</a>.
Yes, these muffins should work well frozen (though I honestly finish them within a few days because they are so good!). Just defrost and maybe warm up 15-20 seconds in the microwave. Enjoy!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Claudia.

Yes, these muffins should work well frozen (though I honestly finish them within a few days because they are so good!). Just defrost and maybe warm up 15-20 seconds in the microwave. Enjoy!

item.title: By: Claudia
item.dc:creator: Claudia
item.description: These look delicious. Can they be frozen, do you know? I’m just wondering about the texture when they are defrosted.
item.content:encoded: These look delicious. Can they be frozen, do you know? I’m just wondering about the texture when they are defrosted.

item.title: By: Olga
item.dc:creator: Olga
item.description: Awesome muffin with a nice crumb, the whole family enjoyed it. Thank you for the recipe!
item.content:encoded: Awesome muffin with a nice crumb, the whole family enjoyed it. Thank you for the recipe!
